title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Forested Countryside with Stream", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
dimensions:
9.9 x 16.5 cm (3 7/8 x 6 1/2 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Landscape with trees. In center foreground, single large tree. Additional trees in middleground on left and right. In right foreground, extending back, a small stream with a wooden bridge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Forested Countryside with Stream", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-23.
